2104.subject: JAPN
2104.descrlong: Introduces the Japanese language for students with no prior Japanese by developing listening, speaking, reading, and writing (Hiragana, Katakana, and Kanji). Looks at Japanese society and the features of Japanese culture that influence the use of the language in daily life. Students learn useful expressions for communicating with native speakers. Requires active participation in instructor-coordinated multimedia and online activities as a mandatory component. (Offered fall semester.)
